properties.name: embedded.mockserver.enabled
properties.description: Enables/Disables configuration of mockserver on startup.

properties.name: embedded.mockserver.startup-timeout
properties.description: Time to wait for a sucessful started container

properties.name: embedded.mockserver.server-port
properties.description: Gets generated server port. (Do not overwrite this!)

properties.name: embedded.mockserver.proxy-port
properties.description: Gets generated proxy port. (Do not overwrite this!)
